typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		Title as string,
		genresgenresgenres as string,
		Year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MoviesDB
MoviesDB select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		each(match(locate('title',lower(name)) != 0),
			'title' = $$),
		each(match(locate('genres',lower(name)) != 0),
			'genres' = $$),
		each(match(locate('year',lower(name)) != 0),
			'year' = $$),
		each(match(locate('rating',lower(name)) != 0),
			'rating' = $$),
		{Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		rating as integer,
		rotton_tomato as integer,
		avg_rate as decimal(18,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		rating,
		rotton_tomato = {Rotton Tomato}
	)) ~> sink1
